title: Super Bowl week preview, 49ers-Chiefs storylines, listener mailbag (Football 1/27)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by John Breech and Sean Wagner-McGough to preview Super Bowl LIV week. The guys discuss top storylines they expect from Miami including Patrick Mahomes taking over the league, what if the 49ers picked Mahomes in 2017, a post-Patriots NFL, coaches redemption stories and more. Then, Will, John and Sean answer Super Bowl mailbag questions (32:30), including a debate on the greatest game ever.

*Note this episode was recorded late last week.
